possibilities.title: Streamline Your Purpose with AI
possibilities.possibilities__text: Streamline cost-effective solutions for your business. Generate legally compliant documents seamlessly with customizable agreements and policies for your website or mobile app anytime, anywhere with iTerms.
possibilities.possibilities__mobileText: Create a seamless payment experience for your customers while using leading technology that adapts to any business, industry, platform, or shopper journey. You’ll be up and running quickly, able to add payment methods easily and increase your conversion rates. Enjoy flexible features to fit your business with a single integration:
featureList: Unlimited downloads for 9.95 a one-time fee
All legal agreements confirmed by a practicing lawyer
EU/US and main privacy laws covered
Automatic legal updates powered by AI
Securely host your policies on our platform
Easy embed policy on your domain
